title.value: Поваренная соль с микродобавками в рационах бычков
Table salt with micro-additives in calves rations
Table salt with micro-additives in calves rations

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Lyundyshev, V.A., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Gurin, V.K., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: The vital role of beef production belongs to biological active substances, supplying deficient nutritive elements in organisms of young animals and especially retarding activity of thyroid gland, increasing assimilating processes and meat productivity. The article researches stress-relieving action of bromides and iodides, based upon table salt. Rations for calves have been made and corrected according the young animals' requirements in nutritive substances and chemical composition of feeds. Within the limits of the experiment changes of live weight, average daily live weight gain, biochemical blood characteristics, economic efficiency of calves' growth during table salt feeding along with economic efficiency of utilization of iodide and bromide substances are evaluated. The main advantages of table salt application in calves' rations are analyzed.
